participant_2.background:
I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head.
i lost my arm in a car accident.
I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others.
i work as a librarian.
I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day.

content.text: Hi! I'm excited to meet you. What are you passionate about?
I am passionate about helping others and cooking. What about you?
That's awesome! I've always wanted to travel but haven't had the chance yet.
Well, if you ever need a travel buddy, let me know!
I would love that! I love meeting new people.
Me too! That's why I love traveling. It's a great way to experience new cultures and meet new people.
I agree! I've also heard that it's a great way to learn about yourself.
It definitely is. I think traveling makes you more open-minded and accepting of others.
I think so too! It's important to be open to new experiences and cultures.
Exactly! I think traveling is one of the best things you can do for yourself.
I agree! I'm so glad we met!
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
